name: io.github.isakskogstad/svt-texttv
description: Access Swedish SVT Text-TV content - news, sports, weather, and TV schedules
description_long: MCP server for SVT Text-TV. Provides tools to fetch Swedish teletext content including news (domestic and foreign), sports (football, hockey, results), weather forecasts (national and regional), and TV schedules (SVT1, SVT2). Data is sourced from texttv.nu.

tools.name: texttv_get_page
tools.description: Get a specific Text-TV page by number (100-899)

tools.name: texttv_get_subpages
tools.description: Get all subpage versions of a Text-TV page

tools.name: texttv_get_news
tools.description: Get news from Text-TV (main, domestic, foreign)

tools.name: texttv_get_sports
tools.description: Get sports content (main, football, hockey, results)

tools.name: texttv_get_weather
tools.description: Get weather forecasts (national, stockholm, gothenburg, malmo)

tools.name: texttv_browse_category
tools.description: Browse pages in a Text-TV category

prompts.name: swedish_news_summary
prompts.description: Get a summary of current Swedish news

prompts.name: texttv_page
prompts.description: Analyze content from a specific page
